verses.name: Proverbs 10:24
verses.text: The fear of the wicked, it shall come upon him: but the desire of the righteous shall be granted.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:25
verses.text: As the whirlwind passeth, so is the wicked no more: but the righteous is an everlasting foundation.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:26
verses.text: As vinegar to the teeth, and as smoke to the eyes, so is the sluggard to them that send him.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:27
verses.text: The fear of the Lord prolongeth days: but the years of the wicked shall be shortened.

verses.name: Proverbs 10:28
verses.text: The hope of the righteous shall be gladness: but the expectation of the wicked shall perish.
